article_title: 'The politicians will follow us when we decide to take a different path'
article_text:
Beckley, WV (25801)

Today

Areas of patchy fog early. Partial cloudiness early, with scattered showers and thunderstorms during the afternoon. High 84F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Michelle James Lifestyles Editor

og.description: For nearly 30 years, Richard Harwood, founder of the Harwood Institute for Public Innovation in Washington, D.C., has been reaching into communities and throughout the world, training, encouraging and inspiring
